statements: DELETE FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE equipment_id = 123 AND maintenance_date = '2022-08-15';
DELETE FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE maintenance_description LIKE '%repair%' AND equipment_name = 'Generator';
DELETE FROM facility_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance';

DELETE FROM maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_task = 'Inspecting Equipment'
